metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20091 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a NULL pointer dereference in AP4_Descriptor::GetTag in mp42ts when called from AP4_DecoderConfigDescriptor::GetDecoderSpecificInfoDescriptor in Ap4DecoderConfigDescriptor.cpp.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
